channel.title: ctf-wiki on shesl's blog
channel.description: Recent content in ctf-wiki on shesl's blog

item.title: Use After Free
item.author: shesl-meow@qq.com (佘崧林)
item.description: 题目：Hitcon Training lab10 文件信息 检查文件安全性： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 $ checksec ./hacknote [*] '/mnt/d/program/ctf/ctf-wiki/useafterfree/hacknote' Arch: i386-32-little RELRO: Partial RELRO Stack: Canary found NX: NX enabled PIE: No PIE (0x8048000) 程序没有开启地址随机化，有栈保护和堆栈不

item.title: Off By One
item.author: shesl-meow@qq.com (佘崧林)
item.description: 题目：Asis CTF 2016 b00ks 文件信息 首先检查保护等级： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 $ checksec ./b00ks [*] '/mnt/d/program/ctf/ctf-wiki/offbyone/b00ks' Arch: amd64-64-little RELRO: Full RELRO Stack: No canary found NX: NX enabled PIE: PIE enabled 程序没有开启栈保护。查看各个段的权限： 1

item.title: ret2libc
item.author: shesl-meow@qq.com (佘崧林)
item.description: 保护等级 首先检查保护等级： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 $ checksec ret2libc3 [*] '/mnt/d/program/ctf/ctf-wiki/ret2libc3/ret2libc3' Arch: i386-32-little RELRO: Partial RELRO Stack: No canary found NX: NX enabled PIE: No PIE (0x8048000) 可以看到这是一个开启了部分只读和栈溢出保护的程序。 程序逻辑
